caption: The video begins with a gray-haired man accompanying his wife and daughter. After his daughter had fallen asleep, the man kissed his wife goodbye and drove off to a very luxurious building. The man chatted amicably with the security guard at the counter in the building for a few moments before a man with long hair walked in and shook hands with the middle-aged man. The man with long hair said that the middle-aged man had known him for a long time, but the middle-aged man said that he had no impression of him at all. An argument ensued, and the long-haired man violently removed his shirt. Finally the two sides reached a settlement.
